targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode!="idle"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{}[5m])))) * 100

(sum( app_http_response_time_sum ) by (x,service, nodeID) - sum ( app_http_response_time_sum offset 5m ) by (x,service, nodeID)) / 
(sum( app_http_response_time_count ) by (x,service, nodeID) - sum ( app_http_response_time_count offset 5m ) by (x,service, nodeID))
